description:
What a hot adorable guy!
Dalton has that Boy Next Door thing goin' on- you know the one with droopy pants that bag off of him showing just enough skin to wanna know what's underneath.
So its extra cool cuz we DO get to see, and the boy is packin' some meat!
He's loves to smile, and you can tell it charms the girls (and a boy or two).
Not sure if he will be back for more, but I really liked working with him, and it will be a damn shame not to at least get him in for some oral action.
Hope you enjoy him, cuz I think he is dreaaaammmy!
title: Dalton - Solo
